Common arguments and documentation for various functions

Source: R/aa_common_docs.R
common_docs.Rd

Common arguments and documentation for various functions

Arguments

region

sf simple features object. Shape file of the region of interest.

update

Logical. Force update of the data?

wells_sub

sf spatial data frame. Subset of wells data output by wells_subset()

permission

Logical. Permission to create the cache folder. If FALSE, user is asked for permission, if TRUE, permission is implied.

Details

Use @inheritParams common_docs to include the above in any function documentation with a matching argument (will only include matching args)
